title: 27 Best Christmas Ornaments of 2024
description: üéÑ Shop merry and bright picks to add to your holiday collection üéÑ
author: Kristi Kellogg, Erika Owen
byline: Kristi Kellogg, Erika Owen, Lauren Arzbaecher
excerpt: Looking for the best Christmas ornaments? Discover 27 gorgeous picks, including glamorous glass baubles, cute novelty picks, and shiny shatterproof sets
text: Shop merry and bright picks to add to your holiday collectionProducts courtesy of the vendors; Graphic: Lauren Arzbaecher All products featured on Architectural Digest are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.Ask 25 people to share their thoughts on the best Christmas ornaments and you‚Äôll get 25 different answers. Most of the time, the one that tops the list has some sort of sentimental value: DIY baubles made long ago in a classroom, shatterproof sets that have graced your family‚Äôs holiday trees for decades, or a handcrafted tree topper from that one time you visited a German Christmas market.The holiday decor scene is saturated‚Äînutcrackers, gingerbread houses, bow garlands, wreaths, strings of snowflakes, glittery pinecones, and that nativity scene that‚Äôs been passed down for generations. The list is long and it is full of red and green. And you can‚Äôt forget about the Christmas lights. Outfitting a holiday tree comes with the opportunity to whittle down your seasonal decorating style. Are you going for something that screams ‚ÄúSanta!‚Äù or would you rather go with something less holiday-specific and turn your living room into a snow globe scene? Plaid or quilted tree skirt? You‚Äôve got some decisions to make, but we can at least help with your ornament collection. Ahead, we pulled together the 27 best Christmas ornaments‚Äîmany of which cost less than $10.Wondershop Acrylic Diamond Ornaments (Set of 12)Consider this: a monochromatic holiday tree with cheeky little diamonds peeking out from the boughs. If you‚Äôre a fan of all things sparkly, go all in and cover your trees in these tiny acrylic trinkets (each one is 1.12" wide x 1.5" tall). The best part is that they can be used year-round, piled high in a big bowl as a tabletop centerpiece. Holiday cheer and home decor.Schoolhouse Shiny Brite Vivid Vintage Ornament (Set of 9)If you love the ornaments that dot the trees in your family photo albums of holidays long past, this set of nine 2.5" tall tulips is a modern take on a classic shape. Inspired by the vintage designs of the 1940s and ‚Äô50s, each one is hand-painted with bright stripes and hides a little sprig of tinsel inside its body.Urban Outfitters Bread In Bags OrnamentOkay, this one‚Äôs quirky and we‚Äôre here for it. It‚Äôs the perfect choice for a White Elephant party, the carb lover in your life, or that friend who loves nostalgia. And there‚Äôs an element of surprise‚Äîthere are three styles (hot dogs, burger buns, and sliced bread)‚Äîall measuring between 3.5" and 4.5" tall and it‚Äôs dealer‚Äôs choice as to which one you get.West Elm Glass Sardines OrnamentPescatarian or tinned fish enthusiast, this glitter-flecked glass ornament is a lighthearted way to tell your favorite ‚Äúgirl dinner‚Äù guest how much you appreciate them. Coming in at 4" tall and 1.5" in diameter, it‚Äôs the perfect size for anchoring a branch.Pottery Barn Apres Ski Ornament Box (Set of 6)Have you ever heard of sporty Santa? Now you have. This set of mercury glass ornaments features all of the makings of the perfect day on the slopes, from the skis and gloves to the gondola. The smaller designs measure 1.25" in diameter and 4.25" in height, while the larger ones are 2" and 4".NYC Felt OrnamentIn New York, there aren‚Äôt many things more iconic than the yellow taxi, but pop a Christmas tree on top and you‚Äôve got a real treat for the eyes. Gift this felted cutie to your friend who recently made a move to the Big Apple for their first Christmas away from home. You know, so they know you forgive them for planting themself an entire flight away.Stanley Water Bottle Keychain & OrnamentThe Stanley colorway they‚Äôve been eyeing may be out of stock, but this ornament is forever. A tiny version of the ever-popular Quencher H2.0 Tumbler, it can be used as a Christmas ornament or a keychain. The top of this 4.45" x 1.97" cutie also comes off, so you can tuck a little note inside.Pat Kim OrnamentsThis set is for your design-enthusiast friend‚Äîthe one who is always visiting a new art gallery or digging into a book about a famous architect. Each one is an adaptation of Pat Kim‚Äôs designs, made of wood and perfect for peppering around the house once the Christmas lights come down.West Elm Mid-Century Paper House OrnamentReminiscent of gingerbread houses, these intricate, snow-dusted homes remind us of a drive through Palm Springs (minus the flurries, of course). Each one ranges in height from 2.2" to 2/4" and the painted paper does a great job of mimicking the interior glow of a home full of party guests.CB2 Velvet Multicolor Ornaments (Set of 4)Two words: velvet ornaments. Sure, playing with size and shape is fun when it comes to decking the tree but don‚Äôt forget about the texture. These are also massive (each one has a diameter of 12.88"), which will add some fun variety if you‚Äôve got a corral of petite decorations.SBK Vintage Brite Twisted Icicle OrnamentIf you‚Äôre looking for merry and bright, this 8" glass icicle ornament is a must-have. Seen here in green, turquoise, and magenta, it‚Äôs also available in a patriotic colorway for something extra festive and with a blue, red, and gold twist.Hallmark "The Office" Coffee Mug Christmas Tree OrnamentAny fan of The Office will want to add this instantly recognizable coffee mug to their cart. The back of the mug even features Dunder Mifflin branding.Northlight Green and Blue Peacock Glass OrnamentLiven things up with this brightly colored bird that‚Äôll perch right in your tree. The ornament measures 4.75" x 4" and is made of delicate glass. It has embellishments of glitter, rhinestones, and sequins and comes ready to hang on a gold cord.Morawski Bright Colored Flower Clip-On OrnamentChristmas tree decorations don‚Äôt have to hang‚Äîthey can also clip on. This festive 5" flower is hand-painted and will look stunning nestled in the branches of your tree. Seen here in white and pink, the ornament is also available in bright green.Northlight Shatterproof Iridescent Ball Ornaments (Set of 60)If you‚Äôre looking for something unbreakable, this set of iridescent balls is where it‚Äôs at. Each plastic ball has a 2.5" diameter and a silver ornament cap. Matching silver string hangers are included.Gallerie II Macrame Snowman OrnamentThis adorable cotton ornament has such a charming handcrafted look, it almost looks like a grandparent made it. The macram√© snowman measures 9.05" x 5.5" inches and will add some serious holiday cheer to your branches.Bright Creations Clear DIY Acrylic Ornaments (Set of 24)If you like variety, this Christmas ornament set has an assortment of acrylic holiday shapes, like stockings or presents, that you can draw or paint on. The possibilities are endless. Each of the ornaments are 3" x 2" or 3" x 3" and are looped with red ribbon for easy hanging.Northlight Gold Mercury Glass Style Ornaments (Set of 12)Keep things classy and refined. Give your tree a vintage touch with this gorgeous gold ornament set with a variety of shapes (all measuring around 3").Christmas Cheer Ornaments (Set of 20)This delightful assortment of hand-blown glass ornaments features a sorbet-inspired color scheme with creamy pinks, icy blues, and more. It‚Äôll make your tree immediately stand out from any other.Vickerman Tinsel Ball OrnamentIf you want razzle-dazzle vibes, pick up this shimmering, shatterproof ornament. It‚Äôs available in a variety of eye-catching colors, including turquoise, gold, blue, lime, champagne, red, and pink (pictured).Funoasis Hanging Gnomes Ornaments (Set of 10)Our love of gnomes is no secret, and a set of ten might just be enough for a holiday fix. Each fabric gnome measures 5.7" x 2.2" and can be hung from your tree or placed around the house as holiday decor.Coca-Cola Glass Blown Mini Diner Ornaments (Set of 4)Any Coca Cola enthusiast will be delighted with this vintage-inspired ornament set. Sprinkle them throughout the tree and be forever reminded of the iconic drink.Old World Christmas Conversation Heart Glass Blown OrnamentsThere‚Äôs absolutely no way we could make a list of the best ornaments and not include this supersweet set of conversation hearts. They‚Äôd make a perfect addition to our favorite pink fake Christmas tree.Memory Lane Keepsake Wedding OrnamentCommemorate a special date (and maybe your first holiday with a loved one?) with this sweet, personalized ornament. You can tailor it for an engagement date or a wedding date.Wondershop Lit Ceramic Retro Christmas Tree OrnamentInspired by retro holiday decor of years past, this mini Christmas tree is available in pink, white, or green. The ceramic ornament is perfect for a pastel color scheme.Wondershop Glass Butter OrnamentAnother fabulous food ornament‚Äîany baker or home chef will want to showcase this essential ingredient on their tree. Like a real stick of butter, the eye-catching glass ornament measures 2" x 4".Kurt Adler Noble Gems French Baguette Glass OrnamentThis French bread is made of glass, so it will really shine against your tree lights. It‚Äôs got a kitschy yet vintage vibe, and it will stand out from other icicle-style ornaments.Kristi Kellogg has been a regular contributor to¬†Architectural Digest¬†since 2019. Her work also appears in¬†Vogue,¬†Teen Vogue,¬†Brides,¬†Glamour,¬†Allure,¬†Cond√© Nast Traveler, and¬†Epicurious. Previously, she managed SEO and content strategy at Cond√© Nast and currently leads SEO at Charles Schwab. She lives in Ventura, California, with her husband and their three dogs.
html:
Shop merry and bright picks to add to your holiday collection

All products featured on Architectural Digest are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

Ask 25 people to share their thoughts on the best Christmas ornaments and you‚Äôll get 25 different answers. Most of the time, the one that tops the list has some sort of sentimental value: DIY baubles made long ago in a classroom, shatterproof sets that have graced your family‚Äôs holiday trees for decades, or a handcrafted tree topper from that one time you visited a German Christmas market.

The holiday decor scene is saturated‚Äînutcrackers, gingerbread houses, bow garlands, wreaths, strings of snowflakes, glittery pinecones, and that nativity scene that‚Äôs been passed down for generations. The list is long and it is full of red and green. And you can‚Äôt forget about the Christmas lights. Outfitting a holiday tree comes with the opportunity to whittle down your seasonal decorating style. Are you going for something that screams ‚ÄúSanta!‚Äù or would you rather go with something less holiday-specific and turn your living room into a snow globe scene? Plaid or quilted tree skirt? You‚Äôve got some decisions to make, but we can at least help with your ornament collection. Ahead, we pulled together the 27 best Christmas ornaments‚Äîmany of which cost less than $10.

Wondershop Acrylic Diamond Ornaments (Set of 12)

Consider this: a monochromatic holiday tree with cheeky little diamonds peeking out from the boughs. If you‚Äôre a fan of all things sparkly, go all in and cover your trees in these tiny acrylic trinkets (each one is 1.12" wide x 1.5" tall). The best part is that they can be used year-round, piled high in a big bowl as a tabletop centerpiece. Holiday cheer and home decor.

Schoolhouse Shiny Brite Vivid Vintage Ornament (Set of 9)

If you love the ornaments that dot the trees in your family photo albums of holidays long past, this set of nine 2.5" tall tulips is a modern take on a classic shape. Inspired by the vintage designs of the 1940s and ‚Äô50s, each one is hand-painted with bright stripes and hides a little sprig of tinsel inside its body.

Urban Outfitters Bread In Bags Ornament

Okay, this one‚Äôs quirky and we‚Äôre here for it. It‚Äôs the perfect choice for a White Elephant party, the carb lover in your life, or that friend who loves nostalgia. And there‚Äôs an element of surprise‚Äîthere are three styles (hot dogs, burger buns, and sliced bread)‚Äîall measuring between 3.5" and 4.5" tall and it‚Äôs dealer‚Äôs choice as to which one you get.

West Elm Glass Sardines Ornament

Pescatarian or tinned fish enthusiast, this glitter-flecked glass ornament is a lighthearted way to tell your favorite ‚Äúgirl dinner‚Äù guest how much you appreciate them. Coming in at 4" tall and 1.5" in diameter, it‚Äôs the perfect size for anchoring a branch.

Pottery Barn Apres Ski Ornament Box (Set of 6)

Have you ever heard of sporty Santa? Now you have. This set of mercury glass ornaments features all of the makings of the perfect day on the slopes, from the skis and gloves to the gondola. The smaller designs measure 1.25" in diameter and 4.25" in height, while the larger ones are 2" and 4".

NYC Felt Ornament

In New York, there aren‚Äôt many things more iconic than the yellow taxi, but pop a Christmas tree on top and you‚Äôve got a real treat for the eyes. Gift this felted cutie to your friend who recently made a move to the Big Apple for their first Christmas away from home. You know, so they know you forgive them for planting themself an entire flight away.

Stanley Water Bottle Keychain & Ornament

The Stanley colorway they‚Äôve been eyeing may be out of stock, but this ornament is forever. A tiny version of the ever-popular Quencher H2.0 Tumbler, it can be used as a Christmas ornament or a keychain. The top of this 4.45" x 1.97" cutie also comes off, so you can tuck a little note inside.

Pat Kim Ornaments

This set is for your design-enthusiast friend‚Äîthe one who is always visiting a new art gallery or digging into a book about a famous architect. Each one is an adaptation of Pat Kim‚Äôs designs, made of wood and perfect for peppering around the house once the Christmas lights come down.

West Elm Mid-Century Paper House Ornament

Reminiscent of gingerbread houses, these intricate, snow-dusted homes remind us of a drive through Palm Springs (minus the flurries, of course). Each one ranges in height from 2.2" to 2/4" and the painted paper does a great job of mimicking the interior glow of a home full of party guests.

CB2 Velvet Multicolor Ornaments (Set of 4)

Two words: velvet ornaments. Sure, playing with size and shape is fun when it comes to decking the tree but don‚Äôt forget about the texture. These are also massive (each one has a diameter of 12.88"), which will add some fun variety if you‚Äôve got a corral of petite decorations.

SBK Vintage Brite Twisted Icicle Ornament

If you‚Äôre looking for merry and bright, this 8" glass icicle ornament is a must-have. Seen here in green, turquoise, and magenta, it‚Äôs also available in a patriotic colorway for something extra festive and with a blue, red, and gold twist.

Hallmark "The Office" Coffee Mug Christmas Tree Ornament

Any fan of The Office will want to add this instantly recognizable coffee mug to their cart. The back of the mug even features Dunder Mifflin branding.

Northlight Green and Blue Peacock Glass Ornament

Liven things up with this brightly colored bird that‚Äôll perch right in your tree. The ornament measures 4.75" x 4" and is made of delicate glass. It has embellishments of glitter, rhinestones, and sequins and comes ready to hang on a gold cord.

Morawski Bright Colored Flower Clip-On Ornament

Christmas tree decorations don‚Äôt have to hang‚Äîthey can also clip on. This festive 5" flower is hand-painted and will look stunning nestled in the branches of your tree. Seen here in white and pink, the ornament is also available in bright green.

Northlight Shatterproof Iridescent Ball Ornaments (Set of 60)

If you‚Äôre looking for something unbreakable, this set of iridescent balls is where it‚Äôs at. Each plastic ball has a 2.5" diameter and a silver ornament cap. Matching silver string hangers are included.

Gallerie II Macrame Snowman Ornament

This adorable cotton ornament has such a charming handcrafted look, it almost looks like a grandparent made it. The macram√© snowman measures 9.05" x 5.5" inches and will add some serious holiday cheer to your branches.

Bright Creations Clear DIY Acrylic Ornaments (Set of 24)

If you like variety, this Christmas ornament set has an assortment of acrylic holiday shapes, like stockings or presents, that you can draw or paint on. The possibilities are endless. Each of the ornaments are 3" x 2" or 3" x 3" and are looped with red ribbon for easy hanging.

Northlight Gold Mercury Glass Style Ornaments (Set of 12)

Keep things classy and refined. Give your tree a vintage touch with this gorgeous gold ornament set with a variety of shapes (all measuring around 3").

Christmas Cheer Ornaments (Set of 20)

This delightful assortment of hand-blown glass ornaments features a sorbet-inspired color scheme with creamy pinks, icy blues, and more. It‚Äôll make your tree immediately stand out from any other.

Vickerman Tinsel Ball Ornament

If you want razzle-dazzle vibes, pick up this shimmering, shatterproof ornament. It‚Äôs available in a variety of eye-catching colors, including turquoise, gold, blue, lime, champagne, red, and pink (pictured).

Funoasis Hanging Gnomes Ornaments (Set of 10)

Our love of gnomes is no secret, and a set of ten might just be enough for a holiday fix. Each fabric gnome measures 5.7" x 2.2" and can be hung from your tree or placed around the house as holiday decor.

Coca-Cola Glass Blown Mini Diner Ornaments (Set of 4)

Any Coca Cola enthusiast will be delighted with this vintage-inspired ornament set. Sprinkle them throughout the tree and be forever reminded of the iconic drink.

Old World Christmas Conversation Heart Glass Blown Ornaments

There‚Äôs absolutely no way we could make a list of the best ornaments and not include this supersweet set of conversation hearts. They‚Äôd make a perfect addition to our favorite pink fake Christmas tree.

Memory Lane Keepsake Wedding Ornament

Commemorate a special date (and maybe your first holiday with a loved one?) with this sweet, personalized ornament. You can tailor it for an engagement date or a wedding date.

Wondershop Lit Ceramic Retro Christmas Tree Ornament

Inspired by retro holiday decor of years past, this mini Christmas tree is available in pink, white, or green. The ceramic ornament is perfect for a pastel color scheme.

Wondershop Glass Butter Ornament

Another fabulous food ornament‚Äîany baker or home chef will want to showcase this essential ingredient on their tree. Like a real stick of butter, the eye-catching glass ornament measures 2" x 4".

Kurt Adler Noble Gems French Baguette Glass Ornament

This French bread is made of glass, so it will really shine against your tree lights. It‚Äôs got a kitschy yet vintage vibe, and it will stand out from other icicle-style ornaments.

    Kristi Kellogg has been a regular contributor to¬†Architectural Digest¬†since 2019. Her work also appears in¬†Vogue,¬†Teen Vogue,¬†Brides,¬†Glamour,¬†Allure,¬†Cond√© Nast Traveler, and¬†Epicurious. Previously, she managed SEO and content strategy at Cond√© Nast and currently leads SEO at Charles Schwab. She lives in Ventura, California, with her husband and their three dogs.
